description:
Haruaki goes back to his family home, but then a few of the students decide to visit him there. While they`re there, the students meet Haruaki`s older brother, Amaaki, who seems to dislike youkai.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Know. Let`s Go to Sensei`s Family Home.
Sou Da, Sensei no Jikka Ikou.
そうだ, 先生の実家行こう.
